code: import{CartActionTypes}from'./cartActionTypes';export var cartToggleHidden=function cartToggleHidden(){return{type:CartActionTypes.CURT_TOGGLE_HIDDEN};};export var addItem=function addItem(item){return{type:CartActionTypes.ADD_ITEM,payload:item};};export var removeCartItem=function removeCartItem(item){return{type:CartActionTypes.REMOVE_CART_ITEM,payload:item};};export var clearItemFromCart=function clearItemFromCart(item){return{type:CartActionTypes.REMOVE_ITEM_FROM_CART,payload:item};};export var clearCart=function clearCart(){return{type:CartActionTypes.CLEAR_CART};};
